item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row equal_height="true" padding_size="xl-padding"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image alignment="center" image="7330"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding" width="3/4"][wyde_heading style="3" text_align="left" title=" GoGreen " subheading="Organic Flower Farm, Portland, Oregon."][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="40px"][vc_custom_heading text="GoGreen Flower Farm is an urban flower farm located 6 miles from downtown Portland, Oregon." font_container="tag:p|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23999999|line_height:38px" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Condensed%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][vc_custom_heading text="We are a small family farm and floral design studio with a big heart, we create wedding and event flowers that are fresh, local and organic. When you stick your nose into one of our bouquets, you know you are breathing in a sweet scent that is free from toxins. We grow elegant wedding flowers from simple to exotic. Designs are inspired by the ever changing seasons. " font_container="tag:p|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23999999|line_height:38px" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Condensed%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" overlap_index="50" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator reflect="reflect-h" overlap="bottom" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" padding_size="xl-padding" parallax="parallax" background_color="#000000" background_image="15" bg_image_url="http://wydethemes.com/gogreen/onepage/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/05/gogreen-bg-009-150x150.jpg"][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column][vc_column text_style="light" width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-8"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="110px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]
We Grown Seasonal Flower using Organic Practices.
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="110px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator style="3" reflect="reflect-h" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_style="full-width" padding_size="xl-padding" css=".vc_custom_1465802110760{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="20px"][wyde_heading style="8" title="Our Services" subheading="02" subheading_color="rgba(187,160,208,0.43)"][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-8"][vc_custom_heading text="We offers a wide variety of services. Providing chemical free, locally grown, flowers of all types and sizes for events and special occasions." font_container="tag:p|font_size:26px|text_align:center|color:%23999999|line_height:38px" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%20Condensed%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="80px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding" width="1/4" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][wyde_banner banner_style="4" title="Weddings & Events" heading_color="#ffffff" subheading="The flower farm provides a wide selection of beautiful, organically grown flowers for weddings and special events." subheading_color="#ffffff" image="31"][/vc_column][vc_column padding_size="no-padding" width="1/4" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][wyde_banner banner_style="4" title="Event Space" heading_color="#ffffff" subheading="Located just minutes from downtown, this urban oasis works for any sized event. From weddings and baby showers to corporate meetings and club gatherings." subheading_color="#ffffff" image="32"][/vc_column][vc_column padding_size="no-padding" width="1/4" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][wyde_banner banner_style="4" title="Custom Potting" heading_color="#ffffff" subheading="Whether you’re bringing in existing pots, or picking out new ones, our designers will work with you to come up with the perfect design and get it planted for you." subheading_color="#ffffff" image="34"][/vc_column][vc_column padding_size="no-padding" width="1/4" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][wyde_banner banner_style="4" title="Delivery" heading_color="#ffffff" subheading="We deliver to your door. Cut the day you order and free delivery straight from the farm. (Delivery to Portland, Oregon only.)" subheading_color="#ffffff" image="43"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" text_style="light" padding_size="xl-padding" parallax="parallax" background_image="47" bg_image_url="http://wydethemes.com/gogreen/onepage/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/05/gogreen-bg-016-150x150.jpg"][vc_column][vc_row_inner padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="110px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-8"][vc_column_text]
Our soul is made of meadow flowers
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="110px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator style="5" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row padding_size="xl-padding"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="6906"][wyde_team_slider show_navigation="true"][/vc_column][vc_column overlap="bottom" width="1/4"][vc_row_inner overlap="left" overlap_distance="100px"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_heading style="3" text_align="left" title="05. Meet The Family"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]The flower farm was established in 2005 by Ellie Gray. Being first generation farmers, finding experienced growers to learn from has become an important part of how we've built our business. Our passion drives our growth to supply more people with more flowers that are locally grown.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" overlap_index="50" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator style="2" reflect="reflect-h" overlap="bottom" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_size="xl-padding" parallax="parallax" background_image="7308" bg_image_url="http://wydethemes.com/gogreen/onepage/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/05/gogreen-bg-022-150x150.jpg"][vc_column text_style="light" text_align="center"][vc_row_inner padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding" offset="vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="90px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="60px"][wyde_testimonials_slider transition="fade" show_pagination="true" auto_play="true"][vc_row_inner padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding" offset="vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="70px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator style="2" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Cafe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row padding_size="xl-padding" css=".vc_custom_1465802896654{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][wyde_heading style="8" title="Flower House Cafe" subheading="04" subheading_color="rgba(187,160,208,0.43)"][vc_empty_space height="70px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_size="xl-padding" css=".vc_custom_1465802915498{padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_row_inner text_style="light" background_color="#bba0ce"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_info_box icon_set="farming" icon_farming="fm-cafe-sign" icon_size="large" color="#fee299" title="Cafe Opening Hours"]Tuesday - Friday: 11.00am - 4.00pm Saturday - Sunday: 9.00am - 6.00pm Lunch is served from 11.30pm - 2.30pm Coffee, teas, cold drinks and cakes in the mornings and afternoons. - Closed Mondays -[/wyde_info_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image alignment="center" image="7070"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column_text]
Relax in our friendly cafe with views across the flower garden.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]

Cafe is located in full view of the central flower gardens. Relax with a coffee and soak up the atmosphere while the children burn off their energy in the indoor children’s play area adjacent. We have strived to present our customers with skillfully prepared dishes using the freshest organic, seasonal, and locally grown ingredients. We have supported our local farming community through direct contact with farmers and through farmers markets.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="40px"][wyde_image_gallery image_size="gogreen-large" gallery_type="slider" visible_items="4" images="7080,7071,7075,7073,7072,7074,7076,7077,7078,7079" show_pagination="true" auto_play="true"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" overlap_index="50" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator style="3" reflect="reflect-h" overlap="bottom" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_size="xl-padding" parallax="parallax" bg_image_url="http://wydethemes.com/gogreen/onepage/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/06/gogreen-bg-020-150x150.jpg" background_image="7093"][vc_column text_style="light" text_align="center"][vc_row_inner padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding" offset="vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="110px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]
Made with delicious, organic ingredients
[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]If you have any questions about our current menu, or you would like to find out what our daily specials are, please call us on +1 111-888-000[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="50px"][wyde_link_button icon_set="farming" icon_farming="fm-recipes-book" style="outline" size="large" title="Organic Kitchen Menu" link="url:%23||"][vc_row_inner padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column_inner padding_size="no-padding" offset="vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_empty_space height="110px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator reflect="reflect-h" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Footer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_style="full-width" overlap_index="50" padding_size="no-padding"][vc_column padding_size="no-padding"][wyde_section_separator style="4" reflect="reflect-h" overlap="bottom" background_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_style="full-width" background_color="#323232" background_image="7284" bg_image_url="http://wydethemes.com/gogreen/onepage/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/06/gogreen-bg-021-150x150.jpg" css=".vc_custom_1466062258627{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column text_style="light"][vc_empty_space height="40px"][vc_single_image alignment="center" image="7332"][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]

+1 111-888-000 | 1234 W Burnside Rd, Portland, OR 97210

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="80px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner padding_size="l-padding" width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1466062137099{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][vc_column_text]
Flowers always make people better, happier, and more helpful; they are sunshine, food and medicine for the soul.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]- Luther Burbank[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_column_text]The gorgeous blooms in every form, be it a cheerful fresh flower bouquet or a single stem bud, have the capacity to make you feel better and happy.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="80px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner padding_size="l-padding" width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1466062147664{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][wyde_info_box icon_set="farming" icon_farming="fm-gardener2" icon_position="left" icon_style="circle" color="#f5f5f5" title="Locally Grown "]Helps support local growers nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo.[/wyde_info_box][vc_empty_space height="28px"][wyde_info_box icon_set="farming" icon_farming="fm-flowers-in-a-pot-1" icon_position="left" icon_style="circle" color="#f5f5f5" title="Organic Flowers"]velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.[/wyde_info_box][vc_empty_space height="28px"][wyde_info_box icon_set="farming" icon_farming="fm-plants" icon_position="left" icon_style="circle" color="#f5f5f5" title="Seasonal Flowers"]perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit accusantium.[/wyde_info_box][vc_empty_space height="80px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner padding_size="l-padding" width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1466062155427{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][vc_column_text]
POPULAR POSTS
[/vc_column_text][wyde_popular_posts count="4" show_date="true"][vc_empty_space height="80px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner padding_size="l-padding" width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1466062163337{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6"][vc_column_text]
FOLLOW US ON
[/vc_column_text][wyde_icon_block icon="fa fa-facebook" style="none" color="#7189c6" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F||target:%20_blank|" css=".vc_custom_1466055524706{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 6px !important;}"][wyde_icon_block icon="fa fa-twitter" style="none" color="#1da1f2" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com||target:%20_blank|" css=".vc_custom_1466055514018{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 6px !important;}"][wyde_icon_block icon="fa fa-pinterest" style="none" color="#bd081c" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com||target:%20_blank|" css=".vc_custom_1466055535394{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 6px !important;}"][wyde_icon_block icon="fa fa-instagram" style="none" color="#ed09d2" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com||target:%20_blank|" css=".vc_custom_1466055545350{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 6px !important;}"][wyde_icon_block icon="fa fa-vimeo-square" style="none" color="#44bbff" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com||target:%20_blank|" css=".vc_custom_1466055555206{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 6px !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="34px"][vc_column_text]
NEWS FROM THE FARM!
[/vc_column_text][contact-form-7 id="7221"][vc_empty_space height="40px"][vc_column_text]   [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="80px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
